00028 #include "dbprim.h"
00029 #include "dbprim_int.h"
00030 
00031 RCSTAG("@(#)$Id: ll__iter_8c-source.html,v 1.3 2006/09/04 15:12:17 spale Exp $");
00032 
00033 unsigned long
00034 ll_iter(link_head_t *list, link_elem_t *start,
00035         link_iter_t iter_func, void *extra, unsigned long flags)
00036 {
00037   unsigned long retval;
00038   link_elem_t *elem, *next = 0;
00039 
00040   initialize_dbpr_error_table(); /* initialize error table */
00041 
00042   /* verify arguments */
00043   if (!ll_verify(list) || (start && !le_verify(start)) || !iter_func)
00044     return DB_ERR_BADARGS;
00045 
00046   /* If the start element is specified, check that it's in this list... */
00047   if (start && list != start->le_head)
00048     return DB_ERR_WRONGTABLE;
00049 
00050   /* select the starting element */
00051   if (!start)
00052     start = (flags & DB_FLAG_REVERSE) ? list->lh_last : list->lh_first;
00053 
00054   /* Walk through list and return first non-zero return value */
00055   for (elem = start; elem; elem = next) {
00056     next = (flags & DB_FLAG_REVERSE) ? elem->le_prev : elem->le_next;
00057     if ((retval = (*iter_func)(list, elem, extra)))
00058       return retval;
00059   }
00060 
00061   return 0;
00062 }
